document_data.name: Graxxygak
document_data.formerhomes: [[Hall of the Black Bull]], [[Twilight Marsh]]{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|21}}
document_data.refs5e: {{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|26}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Graxxygak''' ({{Pronounce|GRAZZ|ee|GAK|refs=}}) was a [[half-dragon]] [[troll]] in the [[Twilight Marsh]] near [[Phlan]] in the 1480s [[DR]].{{ToD-time}}
document_data.History: Graxxygak was the half-dragon son of [[Throstulgrael]] in the Twilight Marsh. He was his father's last line of defense until he was confronted and killed by an adventuring party sent to recover some items from his father's lair.
